heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey gets pissed when he has to deal with a jailbreak because he always ends up using extra web fibers and sometimes even running out.
Ru_trainchinese:
xiān: (графема) деликатный, тонкий
qiàn: (графема) буксировочный трос
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spiderman's Aunt May told him a thousand times to eat his fiber, but he always leaves the house with an empty stomach in a rush in the morning.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "糸" and "韱", the original meaning is small. "Shuowen": "Xin Ye. Cong Shi, Ying Sheng." "Shu‧ Yu Gong": "Juezhu Xuanxuan." Kong Chuan: "Slim, thin."

" Fiber " can mean fine-grained fabric. "Songs of the Chu: Calling the Soul": "Being slender, beautiful and not strange." Wang Yi's note: "Slim, it is called Luo Li."

" Fiber " also refers to the color of the sacrificial clothing. "Book of Rites-Jian Chuan": "The mid-moon and the silk, the silk and the silk, and everything is admired." Zheng Xuan's note: "The black warp and the white weft are the fiber."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "糸" and "韱", the original meaning is small.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「韱」聲，本義為細小。《說文》：「細也。从糸，韱聲。」《書‧禹貢》：「厥篚玄纖縞。」孔傳：「纖，細也。」

　　「纖」可表示細紋織物。《楚辭‧招魂》：「被文服纖，麗而不奇些。」王逸注：「纖，謂羅縠也。」

　　「纖」也指祭服的顏色。《禮記‧間傳》：「中月而禫，禫而纖，無所不佩。」鄭玄注：「黑經白緯曰纖。」

從「 糸 」，「 韱 」聲，本義為細小。《說文》：「細也。从糸，韱聲。」《書‧禹貢》：「厥篚玄纖縞。」孔傳：「纖，細也。」 「 纖 」可表示細紋織物。《楚辭‧招魂》：「被文服纖，麗而不奇些。」王逸注：「纖，謂羅縠也。」 「 纖 」也指祭服的顏色。《禮記‧間傳》：「中月而禫，禫而纖，無所不佩。」鄭玄注：「黑經白緯曰纖。」
From the sound of " 糸" and " 韱", the original meaning is small. "Shuowen": "Xin Ye. Cong Shi, Ying Sheng." "Shu‧ Yu Gong": "Juezhu Xuanxuan." Kong Chuan: "Slim, thin." " Fiber" can mean fine-grained fabric. "Songs of the Chu: Calling the Soul": "Being slender, beautiful and not strange." Wang Yi's note: "Slim, it is called Luo Li." " Fiber" also refers to the color of the sacrificial clothing. "Book of Rites-Jian Chuan": "The mid-moon and the silk, the silk and the silk, and everything is admired." Zheng Xuan's note: "The black warp and the white weft are the fiber."

纖字的基本解释

纖
xiān
见“纤1”。

纖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiān］
［《廣韻》息廉切，平鹽，心。］
亦作“孅1”。亦作“纎1”。“纤1”的繁体字。
(1)细小；微细。
(2)细纹织物。
(3)黑经白纬。指祭服的颜色。
(4)古代妇女的一种衣饰。
(5)吝啬。
(6)指艺术风格上的细巧柔弱。
(7)小数名。一寸或一两的千万分之一称“纖”。
(8)小数名。圆周角度六十分制的小数名。一千二百九十六万分之一度称纤。
(9)通“籤”。用竹木削成一头尖锐的细小杆子。
[②]［jiān］
［《集韻》將廉切，平鹽，精。］
通“殲1”。“纤2”的繁体字。
刺。

纖字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　纖； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页943第29
【廣韻】息廉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】思廉切，?音暹。【說文】細也。【揚子·方言】纖，小也。繒帛之細者謂之纖。【書·禹貢】厥篚?纖縞。【傳】纖，細也。【楚辭·招魂】被文服纖。【註】纖謂羅縠也。　又【禮·閒傳】禫而纖。【註】黑經白緯曰纖。【前漢·文帝紀】纖七日釋服。【註】纖，細布衣也。　又【周禮·冬官考工記·輪人】望其輻，欲其揱爾而纖也。【註】揱纖，殺小貌。　又【史記·司馬相如傳】蜚纖垂髾。【註】纖，袿衣飾。　又【史記·貨殖傳】周人旣纖。【註】纖，儉嗇也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?將廉切，音殲。【禮·文王世子】其?罪則纖剸。【註】纖，讀爲殲。殲，刺也。　又【韻會】師咸切，音攕。與孅通。【前漢·食貨志】至孅至悉也。【註】師古曰：孅，與纖同。

纖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

纖字的起名意思

暂无。

Fiber

Fiber
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiān］
["Guangyun" Xilian cut, flat salt, heart. ]
Also known as "孅1". Also known as "纎1". Traditional characters for "line 1".
(1) Small; tiny.
(2) Fine-grained fabric.
(3) Black warp and white weft. Refers to the color of the sacrificial clothing.
(4) A kind of clothing of ancient women.
(5) Stingy.
(6) Refers to the delicate and delicate artistic style.
(7) Decimal name. One ten millionth of an inch or one or two is called "fiber".
(8) Decimal name. The decimal name of the circle angle in sixty minutes. One thousandth of two thousand nine hundred and sixty-thousandth degree is called fiber.
(9) Through "signing". Use bamboo wood to cut into a sharp small pole.
[②]［jiān］
["Jiyun" cuts Lian, flat salt, fine. ]
Through "J-1". Traditional Chinese characters for "line 2".
thorn.
Fiber
